entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
